title: Bug 15915Import from file system does not create new project
description: Run eclipse.Pop up menu in navigator.Select import...Select some files.Now what...?You can't select a folder because there are none, and it doesn'toffer to create a new project for you.Possible solutions:1. Provide a way to create the project like several of the other imports door2. Don't enable the menu if there are no project to import into
